SELECT m.*,c1.code_name AS dept_name,c2.code_name AS position_name from member m JOIN code c1 ON (c1.code_id = m.dept_code) JOIN code c2 ON (c2.code_id = m.position_code)
AND m.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND c2.code_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND c1.code_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY m.member_id DESC LIMIT #{cnt} OFFSET #{offset}
